column1: Yes. But corona might play spoilsport. Their Chinese JLR sales...
If Corona broke out where you live, you'll wish you lived in Kerala.

T.N.Pratapan MP said he has summoned both union and State health ministers to be present at Thrissur to be part of Corona Virus operation team. The MP also demanded high level probe into the contagious disease. " I doubt Corona Virus could be because of CAA and NRC".
